metadata.title: CVE-2021-47534 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/vc4: kms: Add missing drm_crtc_commit_put Commit 9ec03d7f1ed3("drm/vc4: kms: Wait on previous FIFO users before a commit") introduced aglobal state for the HVS, with each FIFO storing the current CRTC commit sothat we can properly synchronize commits. However, the refcounting was offand we thus ended up leaking the drm_crtc_commit structure every commit.Add a drm_crtc_commit_put to prevent the leakage.
